segments.text: I'm still fixated on the woman at the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's so focused on that plate, as if it's the most important thing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water has really spread across the floor now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's probably soaking into the cabinet wood too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Think of all the potential water damage that will cause.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's truly a shame to see such a lovely kitchen potentially ruined.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And sheâ€™s just there, oblivious, with her foot in the growing puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her neutral expression remains unchanged, which is truly remarkable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I suppose it's possible she simply hasn't registered it yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But it's been running for quite some time now, surely.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could lead to a really expensive repair bill.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me feel a bit melancholic to watch things deteriorate like this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she snaps out of it soon.
segments.speaker: PAR
